complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the infrastructure setup into: Next.js application scaffold with TypeScript, CCC wallet integration, UI component library setup, development environment configuration, and basic routing structure
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple integration points and foundational nature. Requires expertise in Next.js, TypeScript, wallet integration, and tooling setup. Critical foundation that affects all subsequent development.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Smart Contract Architecture - Core Type Scripts
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into individual contract implementations: ckboost-protocol-type contract, ckboost-campaign-type contract, ckboost-campaign-lock contract, Molecule schema design, error handling system, and security validation logic
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Extremely high complexity requiring deep blockchain knowledge, security considerations, and custom contract logic. Multiple interdependent contracts with governance, lifecycle management, and asset security features.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: wallet-based authentication flow, user profile creation and management, session management and security, and role-based access control system
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity involving wallet integration, security considerations, and user management. Requires understanding of CKB wallet patterns and secure session handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: campaign creation interface, quest definition system, campaign approval workflow, quest browsing and filtering, and campaign lifecycle management with analytics
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity with multiple user interfaces, complex business logic, and approval workflows. Requires sophisticated data modeling and user experience design.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into: quest participation interface, proof submission system with multiple formats, IPFS integration for decentralized storage, and admin review workflow for proof validation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple proof types, decentralized storage integration, and complex validation logic. Requires IPFS knowledge and robust file handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: Points UDT implementation with minting restrictions, reward calculation engine, multi-token distribution mechanisms, and locked reward system with batch processing
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring custom UDT development, complex reward algorithms, and efficient batch processing. Critical for platform economics and user incentives.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: verification status management, manual admin review system, future verification method framework, and anti-sybil detection algorithms
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving security algorithms, manual review processes, and extensible verification framework. Requires sophisticated anti-fraud measures.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into: real-time leaderboard system, badge and achievement system, streak tracking with bonuses, and social features with activity feeds
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity with real-time data processing, gamification logic, and social features. Requires efficient ranking algorithms and engaging user experience.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: campaign administrator dashboard, platform administrator interface, analytics and reporting system, and staff management with role-based permissions
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple admin interfaces, complex data visualization, and comprehensive management tools. Requires sophisticated permission systems and intuitive admin UX.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: tip proposal and approval workflow, treasury integration with automated distribution, and personal tipping with social features
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity with democratic approval mechanisms, treasury integration, and social features. Requires careful economic design and fraud prevention.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into individual mock campaigns: AMA boost implementation, X post raids campaign, Community fund DAO campaign, Knowledge boost campaign, Analytics websites boost campaign, and On-chain boost campaign with verification systems
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring implementation of diverse campaign types, each with unique verification requirements. Critical for platform validation and requires comprehensive testing across multiple scenarios.
